name: Object Permanence (Sam Leiman)
description:
Goal:

Freeze a bunch of the balls to establish object permanence.

Controls:

W to jump

A/D to move

Up/Left/Right to freeze

Space to Start

R to restart

I made this game for a "bake off" in the class Looking Back on Growing Up. The assignment called to create something using three words that related to the class. I took the words Piaget, Game, and Freeze in order to make this game. The game represents a child learning object permanence. I created this game using Unity.
